title: BRIEF-Delta Property Fund Says Co And Rebosis Completed Preliminary Due Diligence On Respective Companies
text:
BRIEF-Delta Property Fund Says Co And Rebosis Completed Preliminary Due Diligence On Respective Companies

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 11:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Delta Property Fund Says Co And Rebosis Completed Preliminary Due Diligence On Respective Companies Oct 28 (Reuters) - Delta Property Fund Ltd : * DELTA PROPERTY FUND LTD - DELTA PROP/REBOSIS PROP - RENEWAL OF JOINT CAUTIONARY * DELTA PROPERTY FUND LTD - DELTA AND REBOSIS COMPLETED A PRELIMINARY DUE DILIGENCE ON RESPECTIVE COMPANIES * DELTA PROPERTY FUND LTD - DISCUSSIONS BETWEEN DELTA AND REBOSIS ARE STILL ONGOING

BRIEF-Delta Property Fund Says Co And Rebosis Completed Preliminary Due Diligence On Respective Companies
